Package serverSide.sharedRegions

Class ConcentrationSite

java.lang.Object
serverSide.sharedRegions.ConcentrationSite
public class ConcentrationSite extends Object
Concentration Site. Is implemented as an implicit monitor. All public methods are executed in mutual exclusion. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.

    • ConcentrationSite

      Instantiation of a concentration site object.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • setAssigedAPid

      public void setAssigedAPid(int assaultPartyID, Boolean state)
      New state of the assault party. True if assigned, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      assaultPartyID - assault party id
      state - status of the assault party

    • setAssignedRoomID

      public void setAssignedRoomID(int assaultPartyID, int roomID)
      New room assigned to the assault party.
      Parameters:
      assaultPartyID - assault party id
      roomID - assigned room id

    • startOperations

      public void startOperations()
      Transition start operations in the life cycle of the Master Thief. (PLANNING_THE_HEIST -> DECIDING_WHAT_TO_DO) It is called by the Master Thief when he wants to start the heist operation in the museum.

    • appraiseSit

      public int appraiseSit()
      Transition appraise situation in the life cycle of the Master Thief. As long as the master thief remains in this transition -> state : DECIDING_WHAT_TO_DO
      Returns:
      next transition (DECIDING_WHAT_TO_DO or ASSEMBLING_A_GROUP or WAITING_FOR_ARRIVAL or PRESENTING_THE_REPORT)

    • waitForThieves

      public void waitForThieves()
      Master blocks until enough ordinary thieves have arrived the concentration site. Master is notified whenever a thief arrives at the concentration site (amINeeded()).

    • amINeeded

      public Boolean amINeeded()
      Transition am I Needed in the life cycle of the Ordinary Thief. When thieves are needed they are added to the waiting queue and notify the master. (waitForThieves()) CONCENTRATION_SITE -> CONCENTRATION_SITE : Thieves are blocked until they are called to form the assault groups. Or Thieves are blocked until they are no longer needed.
      Returns:
      True if the heist is not finished and the ordinary thieves are still needed

    • buildParty

      public int[] buildParty()
      Master creates a 3-member assault party
      Returns:
      assault party with 3 thieves

    • prepareAssaultParty

      public void prepareAssaultParty(int[] assaultParty, int assaultPartyID, int roomID)
      Transition prepare Assault Party in the life cycle of the Master Thief. DECIDING_WHAT_TO_DO -> ASSEMBLING_A_GROUP The master starts by creating a group of 3 elements, then notifies the thieves waiting on the queue.
      Parameters:
      assaultParty - list of ids of the 3 elements of the assault party
      assaultPartyID - identification assigned to the assault party
      roomID - room id assigned to the assault party

    • sendAssaultParty

      public void sendAssaultParty()
      Transition send Assault Party in the life cycle of the Master Thief. ASSEMBLING_A_GROUP -> DECIDING_WHAT_TO_DO After creating a group of 3, the master blocks and waits for the last thief to reach the group to wake it up. He is notified by the thief's prepare Excursion function.

    • prepareExcursion

      public void prepareExcursion()
      Transition prepare Excursion in the life cycle of the Ordinary Thief. CONCENTRATION_SITE -> CRAWLING_INWARDS The thief notifies the master that the last member of the group has arrived.

    • sumUpResults

      public void sumUpResults()
      Transition sum Up Results in the life cycle of the Master Thief. Master collects the canvas. Last function to be called by the master thief kills threads and ends the simulation.

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Operation server shutdown. New operation.

    • assignAssaultPartyID

      public int assignAssaultPartyID()
      Function that checks if assault parties have already been created. If not, returns an id of the group that has not yet been created.
      Returns:
      assault party ID or -1 if groups have already been created.

    • assignRoomID

      public int assignRoomID()
      Get a room that has not yet been assigned and still has rooms.
      Returns:
      room ID or -1 if all used or empty

    • getAssaultPartyID_Thief

      public int getAssaultPartyID_Thief()
      Get the ID of the assault party that the thief belongs to
      Returns:
      assault Party ID

    • thievesInAction

      public Boolean thievesInAction()
      Checks if there are thieves in action by checking the state of the assault parties
      Returns:
      True if thieves are in action

    • checkRoom

      public Boolean checkRoom()
      Check if the last room with paintings is already assigned to an assaultParty
      Returns:
      True if last room with paintings is already assigned to an assaultParty

    • allRoomsEmpty

      public Boolean allRoomsEmpty()
      Checks if all rooms are empty Used to check if the heist is over.
      Returns:
      true if all rooms are empty

    • getSizeWaitingThieves

      public int getSizeWaitingThieves()
      Indicates the number of thieves waiting on the concentration site.
      Returns:
      number of thieves waiting on the concentration site.

    • roomStates

      public ArrayList<Boolean> roomStates()
      Indicates which rooms have paintings.
      Returns:
      list of room states.
